Create a mobile app that uses augmented reality to help users learn new languages by translating signs and objects in their environment.
Develop a social media platform for smartphone users to connect with each other based on shared interests and hobbies.
Design a game that challenges users to solve puzzles using only their smartphone's camera and voice commands.
Create an interactive storytelling app that allows users to choose their own path and make decisions that affect the outcome of the story.
Build a personalized nutrition app that uses data from a user's fitness tracker to provide customized meal plans and recipes.
